components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: CHRONIC ENGINE OIL LEAKS.  CYLINDER HEAD OIL LEAK REPAIRED (INCLUDING FRONT CAM SEAL, VALVE COVER, SPARK PLUG TUBE, EGR, COVER TUBE FLANGE, INTAKE MANIFOLD, AND THROTTLE BODY) ON 11/26/99 AT 82K MILES.  FRONT CAM SEAL REPLACED ON 12/31/01 AT 105K000MILES.  FRONT CAM SEAL FAILURE ON 6/9/02 AT 125K MILES.  FAILURE CAUSED DAMAGE TO CAM SHAFT.  ALL LEAKS WERE POTENTIAL FIRE HAZARDS.*AK
